title: Auto decline ranked queue
body:
When I queue for a ranked game it often times auto declines. It's not that I am tabbed out and accidentally click decline, it declines it right away. Sometimes when I queue with friends I can see that it will decline because it will change their status from in queue to online, before the queue even pops for me. Any thoughts?

Thanks

replies.body: This can happen with connections issues struggling to transition from matchmaking to champion select.  it's important to get that fixed, otherwise you're going to start seeing [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalties.  My suggestion would be to run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
